name: Shubhlahari Pratishthan

address: 3rd Floor. Shree Datta Prasad, Opp New English School,

briefDescription: Shubhlahari Pratishthan (SLP) is an all-encompassing charitable organization one of its kind established with an objective to Educate and make aware such that it Empowers positively to initiate a self belief which will further Enlighten path that leads to a proactive sustainable Life. We aim at imparting knowledge of peace, non-discrimination, equality, justice, non-violence, tolerance & respect for human dignity to create global social change.
